short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PowerCircles allows you to filter, manage, tag, and connect with your friends online in a more powerful way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PowerCircles allows you to connect with your social "circles" in a more powerful way.

PowerCircles allows you to manage, filter, tag, and create custom audiences using your social media friends list.

You can filter by hometown, current city, groups they are members of, pages they like, and even birthdays.

PowerCircles will also allow you to better manage and see what friends are inactive, deactivated accounts, or just not engaging with you on your profile. Since facebook only allows you to have 5,000 friends, this allows you to easily identify and remove people who aren't engaging.

There are hundreds of use cases for PowerCircles and we look forward to hearing yours as we continue to build one of the most powerful social media account management tools around.
